definition: to add something extra/an additional increment/addendum/to append/an additional posthumous title
to chase after/to seek/to do one's utmost to seek or procure sth/to recall
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: Does tax preference transition period exist when foreign-funded enterprises deposit additional funds.
sentences.chinese: 外商投资企业追加投资是否存在税收优惠过渡期？

sentences.english: The new US$100 million funding is subject to approval by the World Bank's Board of Directors.
sentences.chinese: 1亿美元追加资金需经世行董事会审批。

sentences.english: With a view to that, toler can be set to guarantee the success in stop loss.
sentences.chinese: 故此透过追加点数，以确保用家能成功止损。

sentences.english: You can send in an ad dition al order later.
sentences.chinese: 你可以以后再下追加订单。

sentences.english: This will mean additional demand for domestic bank credit in the near term.
sentences.chinese: 这意味着近期内国内银行信贷将追加需求。

sentences.english: While an additional 60 billion, one third will be used for rail transit construction.
sentences.chinese: 而追加的60亿元中，三分之一将用于轨道交通建设。

sentences.english: A stock dividend is a prorata distribution of additional shares of a corporation's stock to the stockholders.
sentences.chinese: 红股是按照比例分配给持股人的公司股本的追加股份。

sentences.english: Ketamine produced a dose-dependent reduction in the "rescue" opioid requirements.
sentences.chinese: 氯胺酮可剂量依赖性地减少追加阿片类药物的需要量。

sentences.english: If it does not, consider supplemental insurance.
sentences.chinese: 如果无效或不包含则要考虑追加保险。

sentences.english: square metres of land in the rst quarter;Wanke also acquired 5.62 million square metres of additional land reserves in the rst half of this year.
sentences.chinese: 万科在今年上半年也追加了562万平米的土地储备。

sentences.english: If you are prepared to increase the commi ion, we will order extra 3000 sets.
sentences.chinese: 如果你们增加佣金，我们将追加定购3000套。

sentences.english: The reordering newsboy problem was researched under the uncertainty circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 研究模糊环境下可追加订购的报童问题。

sentences.english: Besides the capital equipment investment, what other areas will require investment?
sentences.chinese: 除了资本性的设备投资之外，还需要哪些追加投资？

sentences.english: Clearly, the need to fund an additional supplementary budget for disaster reconstruction is fueling these worries some more.
sentences.chinese: 显然，灾后重建的额外追加预算带来更多的忧虑。

sentences.english: I have to superadd the budget expenses, in my opinion.
sentences.chinese: 看来，我得追加预算开支啦。

sentences.english: Power is generated from the hips and torso.
sentences.chinese: 用髋部和躯干发力，用双肩还原为手臂追加速度。

definition: to take effect/to go into effect
judgment (by a court of law)/to pass judgment on/to sentence
to use discretion/to take circumstances into account/to make allowances pertinent to a situation
